CREATING A VIDEO FILE USING BASE64 DATA
====================================

Here is a very small base64-encoded MP4 video sample that you can use to test the video functionality.
To use this sample, follow these steps:

1. Copy all the base64 text below (it's a lot of text)
2. Paste it into an online base64 to file converter like:
   - https://base64.guru/converter/decode/file
   - https://www.base64decode.org/ (choose "Decode and Download" option)

3. Save the resulting file as "manufacturing-showcase.mp4" in the public/videos directory
